(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
ignore$

\.ico$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\.
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.png$
\.wav$
^go\.sum$
^grype/db/test-fixtures/curator-validate/bad-checksum/vulnerability\.db$
^grype/db/test-fixtures/curator-validate/good-checksum/vulnerability\.db$
^grype/pkg/syft_json_provider_test\.go$
^grype/pkg/test-fixtures/syft-alpine\.json$
^grype/presenter/json/test-fixtures/snapshot/TestEmptyJsonPresenter\.golden$
^grype/presenter/json/test-fixtures/snapshot/TestJsonImgsPresenter\.golden$
^schema/cyclonedx/spdx\.xsd$
^test/.*\.gemspec$
^test/integration/test-fixtures/image-alpine-match-coverage/lib/apk/db/installed$
^test/integration/test-fixtures/image-centos-match-coverage/var/lib/rpm/Packages$
